Package projetPOO

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    this interface adds clone and draw methods
    Path
    this interface adds the nextPoint method
    Shape
    this interface adds methods allowing to manipulate shapes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Circle
    this class represents the drawable shape, circle
    CirclePath
    this class represents a circular path
    Controller
    this class creates a controller according to an MVC structure
    DrawingPanel
    this class represents a graphic window in which the graphic elements are going to be displayed
    LemniscatePath
    this class represents a lemniscate-like path
    Main  
    Model
    this class creates a model according to an MVC structure
    SpiralPath
    this class represents a spiraling path
    Square
    this class represents the drawable shape circle
    TickController
    this class sets up an loop which calls the evolve method of the controller on a regular basis
    View
    this class represents a view according to an MVC structure
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AvailablePath
    This enumeration is a list of all available paths in this project
    AvailableShape
    This enumeration is a list of all available shapes in this project
